title: Mediterranean Scrambled Eggs with whole grain bread and berries
description: Delicious breakfast option with balanced nutrition for gestational diabetes
instructions: Prepare all ingredients and preheat oven to 375°F if baking.
Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.
Heat oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour in eggs and gently scramble until just set.
Prepare whole grain bread and berries as desired.
Combine all components and serve immediately.
